name: TAB
0:
”Alexa, ask tab robot to start cleaning.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tab robot
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the tab robot skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.
To get started, you will need to link your tab robot skill with your app account.
Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner.

 For instance, you can try the below voice commands:
Alexa, ask tab robot to start cleaning.
Alexa, ask tab robot to stop cleaning.
Alexa, ask tab robot to start charging.
